title: logic board 820-01987-a
message:
hello, i have this logic board of MacBook Pro A2289.

If you can help me, it's a plate without liquid damage, it turned off one day and didn't turn on again.

I don't know where to start what measurements, it's the first time I see this board.

Sorry I try connect only. board with usb HDMI to external monitor and charger original type 61w and too scanned the board for any hot components for a short

Thank you so much
